name: ​​Blessed & Highly Flavored: A Legacy Of Southern Family Cooking​
description: Designer Diaz Allen shares his family's recipes in the highly anticipated, "Blessed & Highly Flavored". For years, those who have been blessed by his cooking have suggested that he share some of his secrets. This book contains over 30 delicious recipes which are a combination of those passed down to Diaz by relatives and those he created. Cooking is a way to show love, and love radiates through the pages of this book. Taste and see for yourself.

name: Gold Leaf Platter
description:
This dazzling gold leaf platter is a conversation piece. Made in Turkey. Measures 18” diameter in width and 4" in height. Not microwave or oven safe.
 
Available for Atlanta Metropolitan pickup ONLY.

name: Amber & Gold Bowl
description:
This stunning amber and gold bowl is a true work of art. Made in Poland. Measures 12” diameter in width and 6" in height. Not food safe.

Available for Atlanta Metropolitan pickup.

name: Emerald City Bowl
description:
This impeccable emerald green bowl makes a statement as an art piece. An Arda Glassware original made in Turkey. Measures 8.5” diameter in width and 4" in height. Hand wash only. Not microwave or oven safe.

Available for Atlanta Metropolitan pickup.
